rooms.description: The entrance lobby integrates with a central courtyard that provides natural light and ventilation throughout the space. The courtyard is designed following Vastu principles, ensuring an inviting center for family gatherings.
A modern open-plan living and dining area, with ample seating and multi-functional furniture. The design emphasizes minimalism and maximizes space utility in a split-level layout.
A compact, modern kitchenette that integrates with the living area. It is designed for efficient workflow and adheres to Indian building norms.
The wet area includes a bathroom and a small utility sink area, designed with water conservation in mind. Vastu principles ensure proper placement relative to the entrance.

openings.description: Provides secure and welcoming entry into the studio. Designed to maximize sunlight in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Each bedroom on the upper level has a private balcony designed for relaxation and outdoor living, ensuring privacy and fresh air.

openings.location: multiple openings within interior rooms facing central courtyard
openings.description: Strategically placed windows to enhance natural light flow and maintain a connection with the central courtyard.

rooms.description: The master bedroom is designed as a split-level space on the upper floor. It features built-in storage, natural light from an expansive window, and a dedicated private balcony.
A secondary bedroom with a small adjoining closet area. The room is designed to maintain a balance in space distribution.
A dedicated rooftop terrace that offers panoramic views and serves as an outdoor living area. The terrace is designed to provide relaxation space while respecting privacy.

openings.location: attached to master and guest bedrooms
openings.description: Ensures each bedroom has direct access to a private balcony, promoting well-being and connection with the outdoors.

openings.location: elevated staircase connecting upper floor to rooftop terrace
openings.description: Sturdy and accessible staircase designed for safety in accordance with local building codes.
